p.d: Emre Bosut, paddleboard guide, prepares to take his clients on a 24km voyage. A round-trip from Tofino to a deserted beach in the Vargas Island Provincial Park, British Columbia, and an opportunity for each to measure themselves against the power of the ocean. Réalisation : Isabelle Major, Jean-François Martel (Saison 2, Canada, 2017)
